description: a(n) = one of five triples of directions in n-th triple of moves in the optimal solution of the Tower of Hanoi; it is a squarefree sequence over a five-letter alphabet.
references: A. M. Hinz, Squarefree Tower of Hanoi sequences, Enseign. Math. (2) 42(1996), 257-264.
A. M. Hinz, The Tower of Hanoi, in Algebras and combinatorics (Hong Kong, 1997), 277-289, Springer, Singapore, 1999.
author: Andreas M. Hinz (hinz(AT)appl-math.tu-muenchen.de)
